info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 3:07PM EDT until July 20 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR MONROE AND SOUTHWESTERN WAYNE COUNTIES... At 307 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Wyandotte to near Monroe to near Sylvania, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Taylor, Monroe and Trenton around 310 PM EDT. Carleton and Wyandotte around 315 PM EDT. Flat Rock around 325 PM EDT. Luna Pier around 330 PM EDT. Grosse Ile around 335 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Newport, Brownstown Township, Gibraltar, Estral Beach, Toledo Beach, Erie, New Boston, South Rockwood, Woodland Beach and Stony Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
